mapper.insert: insert into t_review(review_bno, userID, review_subject, review_content, product_type, product_name, review_date, review_star) select ifnull(max(review_bno), 0) +1, #{userID}, #{review_subject}, #{review_content}, #{product_type}, #{product_name}, now(), #{review_star} from t_review
mapper.update: update t_product set review_count = review_count + 1, star_sum = star_sum + #{review_star} where product_name=#{product_name}
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_bno, r.userID, r.review_subject, r.review_content, r.review_date, r.review_star FROM t_product p , t_review r

update t_review set review_subject = #{review_subject}, userID = #{userID}, review_content = #{review_content}, product_type = #{product_type}, product_name = #{product_name}, review_star = #{review_star} where review_bno = #{review_bno};
mapper.insert: insert into t_reviewcomment (reply_bno, imsi_bno, review_bno, userID, reply_content, reply_regDate) select ifnull(max(reply_bno),0) + 1, ifnull(max(imsi_bno),0) + 1, #{review_bno}, #{userID}, #{reply_content}, now() from t_reviewcomment where review_bno = #{review_bno};
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_reviewcomment where review_bno = #{review_bno};
